PRE_SCRIPT.PSCRI: :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.PREPARE_JOB :IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE# <> "Standalone" OR "Managed Domain" : PRINT "&UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE# must be either Standalone or Managed Domain" : EXIT 1 :ENDIF

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_JBOSS_HOME# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_UNIX_STYLE :SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_HOME# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PRV.INCLUDE.JBOSS_CLI@UNIX
! Validates application name, spaces should not be there :SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME#) :IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# = '' : PRINT Application name must not be empty. Aborting ... : EXIT 1 :ENDIF :SET &SPACE_CHECK# = STR_FIND(&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME#, ' ') :IF &SPACE_CHECK# > 0 : PRINT Application name must not contain space. Aborting ... : EXIT 1 :ENDIF
!---------------------- Enable application command ---------------------- :SET &UC4_JBOSS_CLI_ENABLE_APP# = '&UC4_JBOSS_CLI# --command="deploy --name=&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME#'
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE# = "Managed Domain" : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_SERVER_GROUPS# = "" : SET &UC4_JBOSS_CLI_ENABLE_APP# = '&UC4_JBOSS_CLI_ENABLE_APP# --all-server-groups' : ELSE : SET &UC4_JBOSS_CLI_ENABLE_APP# = '&UC4_JBOSS_CLI_ENABLE_APP# --server-groups=&UC4RB_JBOSS_SERVER_GROUPS#' : ENDIF :ENDIF
:SET &UC4_JBOSS_CLI_ENABLE_APP# = '&UC4_JBOSS_CLI_ENABLE_APP#"'
! --------------------------------------
set NOPAUSE="True"
echo "Checking &UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# status ..."
output=`&UC4_JBOSS_CLI# --command="deployment-info --name=&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME#"` RC=$? echo "$output" | grep -v "ARATools\|Version\:\|Date\:\|GmbH" if [ "$RC" -gt "0" ] ; then exit $RC; fi
if [ "`echo "$output" | grep " not found"`" ]; then echo "&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# does not exist. Aborting ..." exit 1 fi
! In Standalone mode, application state can be checked here :IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE# = "Standalone" if [ -z "`echo "$output" | grep " STOPPED *$"`" ]; then echo "&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# is currently in FAILED or OK state. Aborting ..." : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_FAIL_IF_RUNNING# = "YES" exit 1 : ELSE exit 0 : ENDIF fi :ELSE if [ -z "`echo "$output" | grep " not added *$"`" ]; then echo "&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# is already assigned to all server groups. Aborting ..." : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_FAIL_IF_RUNNING# = "YES" exit 1 : ELSE exit 0 : ENDIF fi
: IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_SERVER_GROUPS# NE "" : DEFINE &SERVER_GROUPS#,string, 100 : FILL &SERVER_GROUPS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_JBOSS_SERVER_GROUPS#,",") : SET &VAR# = 1 : WHILE &SERVER_GROUPS#[&VAR#] NE "" if [ -z "`echo "$output" | grep "^&SERVER_GROUPS#[&VAR#] *"`" ]; then echo "Server group: &SERVER_GROUPS#[&VAR#] does not exist. Aborting ..." exit 1 fi
if [ -z "`echo "$output" | grep "^&SERVER_GROUPS#[&VAR#] *not added *$"`" ]; then echo "&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# is already assigned to server group &SERVER_GROUPS#[&VAR#]. Aborting ..." : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_FAIL_IF_RUNNING# = "YES" exit 1 : ELSE exit 0 : ENDIF fi : SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 : ENDWHILE : ENDIF
:ENDIF
! ------------------- Enable Application -------------------
echo "Starting/Assigning &UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# on JBoss EAP 7 (&UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE#) ..."
output=`&UC4_JBOSS_CLI_ENABLE_APP#` RC=$? echo "$output" | grep -v "ARATools\|Version\:\|Date\:\|GmbH" if [ "$RC" -gt "0" ] ; then exit $RC; fi
if [ "`echo "$output" | grep " operation failed "`" ]; then echo "Failed to start/assign &UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# in JBoss(&UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE#). Aborting ..." exit 1 fi
! --------------------------------------
echo -e "\nStarting/Assigning process finished. Checking &UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# status again ..."
output=`&UC4_JBOSS_CLI# --command="deployment-info --name=&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME#"` RC=$? echo "$output" | grep -v "ARATools\|Version\:\|Date\:\|GmbH" if [ "$RC" -gt "0" ] ; then exit $RC; fi
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE# = "Managed Domain"
: IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_SERVER_GROUPS# = "" ! Return error if the application is still enabled or added in 1 or more server groups if [ "`echo "$output" | grep " not added *$"`" ] ; then echo "&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# is not assigned to all server groups." exit 1 fi
: ELSE : SET &VAR# = 1 : WHILE &SERVER_GROUPS#[&VAR#] NE "" if [ -z "`echo "$output" | grep "&SERVER_GROUPS#[&VAR#] * enabled *$"`" ] ; then echo "Failed to assign &UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# to server group &SERVER_GROUPS#[&VAR#]. Aborting ..." exit 1 fi : SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 : ENDWHILE : ENDIF
:ELSE
if [ -z "`echo "$output" | grep " OK *$"`" ] ; then echo "&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# is not enabled in JBoss Standalone. Aborting ..." exit 1 fi :ENDIF
echo "Start Application successfully."
